```{r}
source("CD_Processing.R")
source("drawEmb.R")
```
```{r}
dat <- CD_In(directory = "JIM767_25Corrected/", prefix = "", TIME = "Corrected")
```
```{r}
rotated <- RePosition(dat[["CD"]][[5]], time = 210, indicatorD = NULL, indicatorV = NULL, indicatorL = "MSa", indicatorR = "MSp")
```
```{r}
figO <- drawEmbLine(
  dat[["CD"]][[5]], 210,
  lineages = list("MSaa", "MSap","MSpa", "MSpp", "Cxa", "E"),
  colors = list(rgb(1,1,0), rgb(0,1,0), rgb(1,0,1), rgb(0,0,1), rgb(0.5,0,1), rgb(1,0,0)),
  opacitys = list(1,1,1,1,0.4,0.6),otherOpacity = 0.2,
  showAxis = T)
figO[[1]]
```
```{r}
figRotated <- drawEmbLine(
  rotated, 210, 
  lineages = list("MSaxa", "MSaxp","MSpxa", "MSpxp", "Cxa", "E"),
  colors = list(rgb(1,1,0), rgb(0,1,0), rgb(1,0,1), rgb(0,0,1), rgb(0.5,0,1), rgb(1,0,0)),
  opacitys = list(1,1,1,1,0.4,0.6),otherOpacity = 0.2,
  xSize = 1,ySize = 1,zSize = 1,
  showAxis = T)
figRotated[[1]]
```
